Dialogue: "So I think that he's really working on some kind of giganto-ultra charged-high tech-super ray that'll blow up anything it hits into a bunch of ice shards," a voice said, younger and much more animated than the Bat's. The Dark Knight himself was still clearly present though as one of his signature grunts of acknowledgement followed the young stranger's theory. The head of every League member snapped up towards the sounds, frozen in shock and anticipation.
Reponse: "You didn't tell me they were going to be here!" he grinned. The boy looked ecstatic as he waved to the group, and Aquaman swore he thought he saw the Bat's lip twitch upwards for a second as well. "Hi!" the boy said, "Wow it's really awesome to meet you guys. Big fan all round." His demeanor relaxed significantly when he saw Superman, and the others suddenly noticed that the Man of Steel did not seem as surprised as they did. "Hey Supes," chimed the boy and to the rest of the League's shock Superman answered as familiarly.

title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "You can stop doing that, Jessica," Matt said. Jessica snatched her hand back.
Reponse: "You're blind," she repeated, and he raised an eyebrow.
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "You're blind," she repeated, and he raised an eyebrow.
Reponse: "Yes," he said. "And?"
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "Yes," he said. "And?"
Reponse: "How'd you know what I was doing?" she clarified.
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "He's basically a bat," Foggy offered. "He's got sonar or something."
Reponse: "Okay, yeah, if you wanna be a drama queen about it," Foggy interrupted. "Hold still, this is gonna hurt."
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "Okay, yeah, if you wanna be a drama queen about it," Foggy interrupted. "Hold still, this is gonna hurt."
Reponse: Matt clenched his jaw as the alcohol hit his open wound. He turned his head in Jessica's direction. "So, now you know."
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: Matt clenched his jaw as the alcohol hit his open wound. He turned his head in Jessica's direction. "So, now you know."
Reponse: "Nelson and Murdock," Luke said, interrupting whatever Matt was leading up to. Jessica frowned in his direction. "You're Matt Murdock."
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "Nelson and Murdock," Luke said, interrupting whatever Matt was leading up to. Jessica frowned in his direction. "You're Matt Murdock."
Reponse: "I am," Matt said, tense.
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "I am," Matt said, tense.
Reponse: "You two have saved half the asses in the city," Luke continued. Matt relaxed, and Foggy laughed. "Thank you guys."
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "You two have saved half the asses in the city," Luke continued. Matt relaxed, and Foggy laughed. "Thank you guys."
Reponse: "No thanks needed," Foggy insisted. "But, please, leave us a review on Yelp. A comment like that from Luke Cage can only help business." He withdrew his alcohol swabs from Matt's side and pinched a butterfly bandage over his clean skin. "There you go, buddy."
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "No thanks needed," Foggy insisted. "But, please, leave us a review on Yelp. A comment like that from Luke Cage can only help business." He withdrew his alcohol swabs from Matt's side and pinched a butterfly bandage over his clean skin. "There you go, buddy."
Reponse: "Thanks, Fog," Matt said, shifting to sit up. Foggy brushed his hand over Matt's side as he tugged his shirt down, and Matt actually
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "Oh, Jesus, they look shocked," Foggy said. "What did you do to them?"
Reponse: "I don't think I've ever seen him smile before," Danny offered. Foggy laughed; it honestly seemed like this guy felt joy a thousand times more often than Matt did.
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "Foggy,"
Reponse: "As much as you can watch something, anyway," Foggy continued, and Matt laughed again, despite himself.
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "As much as you can watch something, anyway," Foggy continued, and Matt laughed again, despite himself.
Reponse: "Fuck you, Foggy," Matt said, leaning gingerly against the back of the couch. He groaned, shifting, and settled. Foggy grabbed a blanket off the arm of the chair behind him and draped it over Matt.
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "Fuck you, Foggy," Matt said, leaning gingerly against the back of the couch. He groaned, shifting, and settled. Foggy grabbed a blanket off the arm of the chair behind him and draped it over Matt.
Reponse: "Well, fellas, I hate to cut this party short, but even Daredevil needs his rest," Foggy said. Jessica finally snapped out of her trance, feeling more like an audience to the world's most confusing magic show than anything else.
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "Well, fellas, I hate to cut this party short, but even Daredevil needs his rest," Foggy said. Jessica finally snapped out of her trance, feeling more like an audience to the world's most confusing magic show than anything else.
Reponse: "No problem," Luke said, while Danny and Jessica attempted to recover.
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "No problem," Luke said, while Danny and Jessica attempted to recover.
Reponse: "Why don't you guys come over before you head out tomorrow night?" Foggy offered. Matt groaned, covering his face with his hands. "Oh, chill out, Murdock. I can make enough for everyone."
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "They didn't even know my name before you ruined my mystique," Matt grumbled, smiling. Foggy smacked his knee.
Reponse: "You don't have any mystique," Foggy told him. "You're about as mysterious as I am." He turned to Jessica. "Come by tomorrow around seven, I'll have food for all of you. Any allergies?"
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "Got it." He stood, offering a handshake to each of the other three Defenders again before showing them to the door. Once they were in the hall, he leaned out, sliding the door shut slightly behind him. "Thank you for bringing him back. And for working with him at night. It makes me feel better to know he's not out there alone."
Reponse: "Hey, anytime," Luke said. Jessica grinned and clapped a hand on Foggy's shoulder.
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "Hey, anytime," Luke said. Jessica grinned and clapped a hand on Foggy's shoulder.
Reponse: "We love working with Matt," she told him, and Danny leaned in closer.
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "We love working with Matt," she told him, and Danny leaned in closer.
Reponse: "And we'll love it even more now," Danny said.
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "And we'll love it even more now," Danny said.
Reponse: "I'll break out his diary," Foggy joked, and Matt yelled something indecipherable from inside their apartment. Foggy grinned. "See you tomorrow."
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "I'll break out his diary," Foggy joked, and Matt yelled something indecipherable from inside their apartment. Foggy grinned. "See you tomorrow."
Reponse: "See you," they said, leaving Foggy to vanish back into his apartment, the door clicking shut behind him. Danny immediately punched the air.
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "See you," they said, leaving Foggy to vanish back into his apartment, the door clicking shut behind him. Danny immediately punched the air.
Reponse: "He's so cute!" Danny exclaimed softly. "He's a normal guy!"
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "He's so cute!" Danny exclaimed softly. "He's a normal guy!"
Reponse: "He has the ability to smile," Jessica commented.
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "He has the ability to smile," Jessica commented.
Reponse: "He's a nice person," Luke added.
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "He's a nice person," Luke added.
Reponse: Danny continued. "And their coffee cream is so nice!"
title: Say You Don't Know Me (or Recognize My Face)
author: ShowMeAHero

Dialogue: "Might I have the name of such a brave child?" he asks in the same tone of voice.
Reponse: He shakes his head. "N' bwave," he whispers very, very quietly.
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: The man gives a soft chuckle at the boy's enthusiasm. "Alright then." He stares at the boy some more, clearly thinking "Leonardo," he then declares after a few moments, "What do you think?"
Reponse: But when the man notices, he doesn't scold or yell at him. He opens his arms instead. Leonardo is in them in an instant. This is the first hug he can ever remember having. His arms are strong and tight and he feels so safe in them. "My brave little lion," the man mutters.
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: Pitch chuckles. "I am glad you think so. Not many do. But I am not here to scare you. I am here to help. You're relatives do not treat you well, am I correct?"
Reponse: "Shh, little one. It is alright. I am here to help you. I know they do not love you. I can feel your fear. I will protect you for you are one of mine."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "Shh, little one. It is alright. I am here to help you. I know they do not love you. I can feel your fear. I will protect you for you are one of mine."
Reponse: "I protect all my children - the ones who need me. And you need someone to care for you, yes?"
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "Very well. I will provide for you. Understand I cannot stop everything. But I will do everything in my power to protect you. Yes?"
Reponse: "The next time I come, I will have warmer blankets and food. Those are things you need correct?"
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "The next time I come, I will have warmer blankets and food. Those are things you need correct?"
Reponse: "No my little lion, this is very much real. Before I leave, there is one more thing I will leave you with." He takes one of his hands away from Leonardo's back and urges the boy back. "Here," he slips a black bracelet around a too thin wrist.
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "Don't," the boy mutters, "Sorry."
Reponse: "You are curious, I know. But you have to respect other people's privacy as well."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "Mr. Potter," Professor Snape calls out at the end of Potions, "stay after," he commands. Leonardo nods and sets his bag back down on the ground nervously. What could his Head of House want? He has never taken the time to talk to him before. He has barely even looked at him before. And when he does, they are never very friendly looks. Leonardo knows what Pitch says, but he still can't help but wonder if maybe he is wrong. He doesn't want to think so, because Pitch is never wrong, but the thought has crossed the boy's mind.
Reponse: "Come Potter, this is not a conversation for the classroom." Professor Snape turns and walks out the door.
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "Potter," he starts.
Reponse: "Leonardo," he begins again and Leonardo is surprised, even if he shouldn't be. Of course the Professor knows his name, official or not. "You know what this means. I am here to help you. You, Leonardo, not the Boy-Who-Lived, not Harry Potter, but you, just as I have helped others in your situation. Just as I was in your situation."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "Leonardo," he begins again and Leonardo is surprised, even if he shouldn't be. Of course the Professor knows his name, official or not. "You know what this means. I am here to help you. You, Leonardo, not the Boy-Who-Lived, not Harry Potter, but you, just as I have helped others in your situation. Just as I was in your situation."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "Don't what child?"
Reponse: "Don't hate me?" he whispers.
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "Severus Snape," the boy replies, shaking it.
Reponse: "Pleasure to meet you Severus Snape. Now, as my first act, that yelling has gone on long enough, don't you think?"
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "Pitch!" a young voice yells when he appears in the bedroom.
Reponse: Pitch's lips twitch into what might have been a small smile if one was looking closely enough. It does appear that someone is excited. A small body impacts with his own, wrapping arms tightly around his waist. He chuckles. "Someone has had sugar today," he comments, looking down at the bright happy face of the child hugging him.
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "My name is Sssshadow," the snake answers.
Reponse: "He is made of my dream sand," Pitch informs him. "He is connected to my Nightmares, if you ever need to pass on a message."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "Just the majority of them." His breath catches as Leonardo makes a completely unnecessary dramatic dive to avoid an opponent. It would appear that Gryffindor is due to lose some points very soon. Maybe even a detention or two.
Reponse: "I can hear you plotting. Isn't that an abuse of power?"
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "I can hear you plotting. Isn't that an abuse of power?"
Reponse: "Dunderheads will do something to deserve it soon enough. I am simply planning ahead."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "They all are. Why this is such a popular sport..." Severus trails off as Leonardo sees the Snitch and takes off after it, Ginny hot on his tail. They zip in between, around, over and under the other players, both grimly determined.
Reponse: "Oh the joys of youth," Pitch comments before melting back into the shadows.
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "Rather dreary around here lately, is it not?"
Reponse: "Pitch!" Leonardo exclaims, "What are you doing here?"
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: Pitch chuckles. "Not much," he amends.
Reponse: Leonardo nods. "Better. And I know fear is natural. Just right now, I'm not it's biggest fan. I really, really hate Dementors."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: Leonardo sighs. "Yes. I feel them constantly, even in my dreams. I keep seeing my Mum killed, hearing Dad die. It's..." he trails off.
Reponse: Pitch lays a comforting hand on his shoulder. "As soon as Black is caught, they will be gone."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: Pitch nods. "I see, while if I happen to see him, I will keep that in mind."
Reponse: Leonardo smiles. "Ta," he says gratefully, "I've been worried that I would sound crazy if I told anyone."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: He shrugs. "My job is to protect you, not shield you from reality."
Reponse: Leonardo snorts. "You and Sev are  way  too similar."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: Pitch smirks. "I know. Now come, I will escort you to your next class before anyone's head explodes from worry. I can already feel your Blonde companions concern from here."
Reponse: Leonardo rolls his eyes. "Draco," he mutters.
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "I just received word, I passed my Mastery. I am now the youngest Potion Master in Britain."
Reponse: "And this is cause for worry why?"
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: Severus growls. "He uses us," he continues, "the bracelets. He is using us, manipulating us. He thinks we will follow him because he also has one as well. As if that justifies his means. He says he supports us, but he is breaking us more." He uncurls abruptly and glares at the shadow man, "How can you let this continue? He is  hurting  us. Whose side are you on?  His ? Are you going to tell him what I have said? Will you stand by as He kills me for refusing Him?" Severus asks viciously. He knows his fears are fueling him and he knows Pitch has to realize this as well. But he can't seem to stop. "Are you-" A hand covers his mouth forcibly.
Reponse: "That is enough," Pitch says dangerously. "You will not talk to me like that young man, do you understand? Or so help me I will take you over my knee."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "That is enough," Pitch says dangerously. "You will not talk to me like that young man, do you understand? Or so help me I will take you over my knee."
Reponse: Pitch sighs. "Oh my child," he pulls Severus into a hug and Severus goes willingly. He grips Pitch's robe tightly as he starts to shake. He can't help himself. Despite what everyone thinks, he is not heartless  or  emotionless. He just doesn't show it. The years have shown him it is safer to build up his walls to protect himself.
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: Pitch sighs. "Oh my child," he pulls Severus into a hug and Severus goes willingly. He grips Pitch's robe tightly as he starts to shake. He can't help himself. Despite what everyone thinks, he is not heartless  or  emotionless. He just doesn't show it. The years have shown him it is safer to build up his walls to protect himself.
Reponse: "I have not talked to Tom in many years. He may still bear my bracelet, but he is no longer one of my children. Not because I abandoned him. I make a promise to each of you, never to abandon you. That includes Tom as well. But he has chosen his path and I have no place with him anymore. He once clung to me as well. He sought my protection. But his fear is now too strong. He fears Death and weakness and sees me as one. I have not abandoned him, but he has abandoned me."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: Draco shrugs. "They don't seem impossible to me."
Reponse: "And Pitch has always been real to me. You know... you know why Severus adopted me. Well, Pitch protected me until I came to Hogwarts. That's what he does. He doesn't just give kids nightmares. He protects... abused kids," he says the last part quickly, still not comfortable talking about the Drusely's to other people, "He helps us when no one else can or will. He's, well he acts like Sev. Or Sev acts like him technically." He won't tell Draco why, he doesn't need to know that.
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: Leonardo rolls his eyes at the two of them. Pitch can be such a drama queen sometimes. "Draco, this is Pitch Black. Pitch, this is my best friend Draco."
Reponse: "My, my, best friend is it? You've certainly come a long way from the start of First Year. I seem to recall a number of complaints then, about a spoiled prattish blonde."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "Yes," Leonardo agrees, "and then the prat decided that instead of fighting with me, he would glue himself to my side. Possessive prat."
Reponse: "Oh be quiet Leo."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: Draco's eyes turn icy. "How dare he," he hisses, "Doesn't he know what they did?" He may not know much, but what little Leo has let slip infuriates the young boy to no end. How dare they treat his Leo like that. Who do they think they are?
Reponse: Pitch grins. "I like this one," he declares smugly.
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "Sir?"
Reponse: "Leo, my boy, come in, come in. Lemon drop?"
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "I did. How are you holding up Leo? It must be a relief to finally have the Dementors gone."
Reponse: "It is sir. I never thought I'd be sick of chocolate, but if I never have to eat another chocolate frog for the next five years, it will be too soon."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "It is sir. I never thought I'd be sick of chocolate, but if I never have to eat another chocolate frog for the next five years, it will be too soon."
Reponse: Dumbledore chuckles. "I am sure it will be much sooner than that, but I understand the sentiment. And how is living with Severus? No troubles there?"
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: Dumbledore stands up. "I am sure you two have much to talk about. I'll give you some privacy, shall I?" He leaves his office, eyes twinkling as he goes.
Reponse: Leonardo turns and looks at this man. The one who should have raised him if things had gone better. He isn't sure what to think. "It's Leonardo actually," he finally says.
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: Sirius comes over and sits in the chair next to him. "Is it? Why's that kiddo?"
Reponse: "It's the name I grew up with," he answers, not elaborating.
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "Ironic, isn't it? Brave lion."
Reponse: Leonardo shrugs. "Yes, but that doesn't mean it still isn't my name."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "Fair enough. So, my godson is a snake? That isn't something I bet anyone saw coming, what with both your parents being in Gryffindor and all."
Reponse: "Yes, it was. But the Slytherins were much more welcoming then the Gryffindors were," he says, thinking back onto the first year and the trouble he had with that House.
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "Yes, it was. But the Slytherins were much more welcoming then the Gryffindors were," he says, thinking back onto the first year and the trouble he had with that House.
Reponse: Sirius must sense some of this because he doesn't comment. He just stares at him instead. "You look so like James, you know. Only you have-"
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "-my Mother's eyes, I know. I get that a lot."
Reponse: Sirius chuckles. "I'm sure you do. Now tell me a little about yourself. You're Seeker right? A good one as well. James was a great flier - he was a Chaser. What's your favorite subject? Mine and James was Transfiguration, but Lily always liked Charms."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: Sirius sneers. "Snivellius still teaching huh? And he's your Head of House. I don't know how you can stand it. When we were in school, he was nothing but a nasty little pest. But he made the best target for some of our best pranks. Did you know that he-"
Reponse: "Stop it!" Leonardo shouts. "Don't talk about him like that. You don't know the first thing about him."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "Was? There is no was. He doesn't abandon people."
Reponse: "He took care of me before I came to Hogwarts. But then I made friends with James and found better, lighter, protection."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "He was Dark, just like my family."
Reponse: "No! You cannot compare your family, who hurt you, to Pitch, who protected you. That isn't right."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "He is Dark kid."
Reponse: "Dark does not mean evil. He still protects you, no matter what."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "Ever since the first time I held you in my arms, I only wanted the best for you. I'm sorry it didn't turn out that way kiddo."
Reponse: Leonardo shrugs. "Turned out alright eventually."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "Ah, I see. Bully trouble."
Reponse: "They won't stop. They tease me and prank me and call me 'Snivellius'. I'm already an outcast enough. Why do they have to make it worse?"
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "They won't stop. They tease me and prank me and call me 'Snivellius'. I'm already an outcast enough. Why do they have to make it worse?"
Reponse: "Children, just like adults, can be cruel. How long has this been going on?"
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "I'm not a baby."
Reponse: "Indeed you are not. But that does not mean you are not still a child and in need of assistance occasionally."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

Dialogue: "Ah, I suppose then that you do not prescribe to the saying 'Good guys wear black'? That is a saying over here, is it not?"
Reponse: Jamie snorts. "You're not Batman."
title: The Dark Guardian
author: InTheShadows
fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling,Rise of the Guardians (2012)

He has to be planning on tricking him again. Or betraying him. But there is still one thing bothering Jack and it is getting worse the longer this conversation goes on. Why hasn't Pitch attacked yet? "I protect children," he answers firmly.

Dialogue: "How about you?" He doesn't say anything about UA or the hero course. Midoriya is quirkless, and he knows the kind of world they live in; they are at the bottom of the social ladder, of the power structure that holds up society as it is. It's something that can't be helped, but Shinsou feels a familiar bitterness bubbling up his throat. Unfair, he thinks. But that's just how the world works.
Reponse: "I used to want to be a hero," Midoriya says nostalgically. He swipes at the freckles that dot his cheeks, oddly reminiscent. "I was a big dreamer. Looked up a lot to All Might. Still do, though I suppose not as much."
title: “You’re a hero?” they ask. “Ah, well,” Midoriya says back, “it’s more of a side job.”
author: Mugg
fandom: Pu nohi-ro-akademia | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia

Dialogue: "I used to want to be a hero," Midoriya says nostalgically. He swipes at the freckles that dot his cheeks, oddly reminiscent. "I was a big dreamer. Looked up a lot to All Might. Still do, though I suppose not as much."
Reponse: "But it's not exactly a goal I can achieve." Midoriya sits himself up and laughs. It's somehow empty and full at the same time. "I'm getting a high paying job that doesn't require me to throw myself into danger. Preferably six figures."
title: “You’re a hero?” they ask. “Ah, well,” Midoriya says back, “it’s more of a side job.”

Your capture weapon and quirk mesh really well together, so how did you figure out that you wanted that kind of weapon? How does your quirk work? How does your weapon work? How long did you spend learning how to use that capture weapon?"

Dialogue: "Shut it!" Bakugo roars, fireworks sparking from his open palms. "Teach, don't lump me in with these fucking extras! As if they could ever amount to me!" The arrogance dripping from those words almost makes Midoriya gag, but he keeps it in because he'd rather do it to Bakugo's face.
Reponse: "Ah yes, Bakugo, you're aiming for UA, yes?" The teacher smiles fawningly, and Midoriya can't help but think it looks absolutely disgusting. Why is the teacher being a kiss-ass to the guy who was obviously the biggest asshole in the whole school? Because of some strong flashy quirk?

Dialogue: What part of that didn't make sense? He will never claim to understand her mind. "Hatsume, when have I ever told you I wanted to be a hero?" He's a materialistic bitch, and he is not ashamed of it. Woo, money! Woo, paying rent! Woo, paying bills! Being a hero would be counter-intuitive to his goal, since, you know, he'd probably die.
Reponse: Hatsume stares at him in contemplative silence. It does not feel very good being at the end of one of those Hatsume Stares. Then suddenly, she's bouncing up and down and dragging him outside the gym. "Let's go! I have so many babies for you to see!"

Shinso takes a few more steps into the room, his face blank in a way that means he's definitely trying to hold back on something. Midoriya looks at him suspiciously. "Anyways.
